Description: Arab Sea Information Systems (known as: Arab Sea) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Parallel Market” (NOMU) since February 2017. Arab Sea operates within the Software & Services sector focusing on Application Software. Arab Sea is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1980.
